name: hank
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a thick piece, or a bunch (= a number of long pieces held together) of hair, thread, rope, etc.: hank of She cut off a hank of her hair. I ordered a few hanks of yarn for knitting.
More examplesFewer examplesThere were hanks of silk thread in many colours.It resembled a hank of wire.Raffia costs around £1.99 for a 40g hank. His hair had fallen out in hanks.
